Text: Re ISDA Notice and AmendmentTana I am following up on the issue for Maureen Piercey who is out of the office Will the TransAlta guarantee provided to Enron North America for financial deals be acceptable TransAlta currently sleeves the financial deals through Enron Canada and TransAlta can not continue to do this due to the administrative difficulties that are created by this process Please let me know if the guarantee attached below is acceptable and if Enron North America will be will to sign the ISDA amendment If you want to contact me directly my number is Thanks Geordie Forwarded by Geordie Hochbaum on PM Maureen Piercey AM To Geordie ransAlta cc Subject Re ISDA Notice and Amendment Forwarded by Maureen Piercey on AM Maureen Piercey PM To cc Sterling ransAlta Katalin ransAlta Subject Re ISDA Notice and Amendment Document link Maureen Piercey Attached please find the form of Guarantee to be issued by TransAlta It is the same form we issued to Enron for physical power transactions If there are any credit concerns please call me at Maureen See attached file TAC to Enron NA re TEMUS ISDA doc Sterling Koch PM Embedded image moved to file picpcx To cc Katalin ransAlta Maureen ransAlta Subject REQUEST ISDA Notice and Amendment Please find attached our form of notice and amendment to the ISDA agreement between MEGA and Enron North America as successor to Enron Capital Trade Resources Let me know if you have any changes and we will forward executed copies along with copies of the Merger Certificates THX Sterling PS Our credit person is Maureen Piercey See attached file MEGA merger notice Enron NAdocSee attached file Enron NA AMENDMENT schedule blkdoc TAC to Enron NA re TEMUS ISDA doc picpcx MEGA merger notice Enron NAdoc Enron NA AMENDMENT schedule blkdoc
